item.title: MobileNet and Cloud-Collaborative Pose Recognition Application
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project aims to address the lack of exercise motivation and digital divide among elderly people in an aging society. We developed an interactive game system based on AI body recognition, including “Memory Card Flip” and “Yoga Guidance,” allowing seniors to exercise and rehabilitate at home using simple equipment.
